mapper.select: select * from permission_resource where selfID = #{selfID ,jdbcType=INTEGER} and selfType= 'SYS_APP'
select * from permission_resource where selfID = #{selfID ,jdbcType=INTEGER} and selfType= 'SYS_MENU'
select * from permission_resource where selfID = #{selfID ,jdbcType=INTEGER} and selfType= 'SYS_ELEMENT'

select b.resourceID as resourceID, a.appName as selfName, b.selfType as selfType, b.selfID as selfID, ( select count(*) from permission_resource c inner join permission_menu d on c.selfID = d.menuID where c.parentType='SYS_APP' and c.selfType = 'SYS_MENU' and c.parentId = b.selfId ) as isParent from permission_app a inner join permission_resource b on b.selfID = a.appID and b.selfType='SYS_APP' and b.parentType='SYS_APP' and a.isDelete = 1

select a.resourceID as resourceID, b.menuName as selfName, a.selfType as selfType, a.selfID as selfID, ( select count(1) from permission_resource c inner join permission_menu d on c.selfID = d.menuID where d.isDelete = 1 and c.parentID = a.resourceID and c.selfType = 'SYS_MENU' ) as isParent from permission_resource a inner join permission_menu b on a.selfID = b.menuID and a.selfType = 'SYS_MENU' and b.isDelete=1 where a.parentID = #{parentID ,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.resourceID as resourceID, b.elementName as selfName, a.selfType as selfType, a.selfID as selfID, 0 as isParent from permission_resource a inner join permission_element b on a.selfID = b.elementID and a.selfType = 'SYS_ELEMENT' and b.isDelete=1 where a.parentID = #{parentID ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
